name: Spooky Dwellers - Collector's Edition
description:
Armed with Grandma's treasured talismans of light, you hold the power to repel the lurking spirits that haunt every nook and cranny. But beware! These crafty dwellers cleverly hide behind various obstacles, obstructing the path of your sacred light. Engage in a strategic Match 3 game against the darkness as you destroy menacing pumpkins, clear overgrown grass, and unlock doors. Master the art of manipulating the talismans, redirecting their radiant glow to illuminate even the darkest corners. With each level, you will inch closer to driving away the spooky dwellers, liberating Grandma's house from their ghostly grip. But the adventure doesn't end there! As you progress, unlock the ability to decorate the terrace of Grandma's house, transforming it into the ultimate Halloween party destination. Celebrate your triumph over the supernatural with a grand gathering under the moonlit sky. Take control of the talismans' luminous power and banish the spooky dwellers once and for all!

Features
90 Match 3 levels.
Hidden Object minigames.
Puzzle and memory minigames.
Brain teasing Match 3 challenges.
Collect trophies for more coins.
Get The Terrace ready for a Halloween party.
Many more challenges.

Included Collector's Edition Bonuses
60 bonus Match 3 levels.
Wallpapers.
Extra art and stories.
Bonus Hidden Objects and Puzzles.
Higher or Lower minigame.
The Coin Collector minigame.
Exclusive items for The Terrace.
Extra configuration options for Match 3 levels.
